title: Module Pre-Planning Examples
description: Example answers for module pre-planning to demonstrate quality standards

answers.purpose: Manage customer contact information and communication history for sales and support teams. This module will centralize customer data, track interactions, and provide search capabilities to improve customer relationship management.
scope: Search and filter contacts by various criteria
Import/export contact data from CSV files
Track communication history with timeline view
Organize contacts by tags and categories
answers.users: Primary users include sales team members who need to track leads and customers, customer service representatives who need access to contact history, and sales managers who need reporting capabilities.
data_entities: Contact: name, email, phone, company, position, tags, created_date, updated_date
Communication: type, date, content, direction, contact_id, user_id
Company: name, industry, size, website, address, contacts_count
answers.performance_requirements: Handle 50,000+ contacts with sub-second search response time. Support 100 concurrent users. Process bulk imports of 5,000+ records within 2 minutes.
security_considerations: Encrypt PII data at rest and in transit
Audit logging for all data modifications
answers.ui_requirements: Clean, modern interface with contact list view, detailed contact cards, advanced search filters, bulk action capabilities, and mobile-responsive design for field sales use.
success_metrics: Reduce time to find contact information by 60%
Process imports 5x faster than current Excel-based system
constraints: Must integrate with existing CRM database schema
Limited to current React/Node.js technology stack
